meanings: Verb To reduce one's angry or upset feelings and rest easy.

meanings.meaning: with one’s back to the fire

vlive.korean: 어깨 맞추고 그다음 완전 돌려 완전 돌리고 완전 꺾어! I would set my shoulders straight, turn it completely! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 쫑알쫑알 해도 돼요?🦋
vlive.english: I would set my shoulders straight, turn it completely!

vlive.korean: 돌리고, 돌리고 보여드릴게요 - 묻고 더블로 가! After spinning it. - Let's go double! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] N.Flying X Eating Show - 엔플라잉 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: After spinning it. - Let's go double!

vlive.korean: 그러네요 - 룰렛 한번 돌리고 갈까요? Right. - Shall we do that now? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: Right. - Shall we do that now?

vlive.korean: 왜 잭슨 계속 등 돌리고 있어요? JACKSON, why are you turning your back? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: JACKSON, why are you turning your back?

vlive.korean: 네? - 꽂으면 소리 딱딱 나고 머리 돌리고 이렇게 해야 되는 거 아니야? Huh? - Isn't it supposed to make sounds if you stick it in? And aren't you supposed to spin the head? 듣기 View video HA SUNG WOON : ♡HAPPY SUNGWOON DAY♡
vlive.english: Huh? - Isn't it supposed to make sounds if you stick it in? And aren't you supposed to spin the head?

examples.korean: She was twiddling the ring on her finger. 발음듣기 그녀는 손가락에 낀 반지를 빙빙 돌리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was twiddling the ring on her finger. 발음

examples.korean: The report has turned the spotlight on the startling rise in street crime. 발음듣기 그 보고서는 길거리 범죄의 놀라운 증가에 관심을 돌리고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The report has turned the spotlight on the startling rise in street crime. 발음

examples.korean: It worked contrariwise—first you dialled the number, then you put the money in. 발음듣기 이것은 반대로 작동을 해서, 번호를 먼저 돌리고 나서 돈을 넣게 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It worked contrariwise—first you dialled the number, then you put the money in. 발음

examples.korean: He was rolling a pencil between his fingers. 발음듣기 그는 손가락 사이로 연필을 돌리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was rolling a pencil between his fingers. 발음

examples.korean: Like her, more Koreans, as well as foreign tourists, are turning their backs on Jeju due to a lack of content to encourage tourists to revisit the island. 발음듣기 그녀처럼 제주도에 대한 관광객들의 재방문 장려를 위한 콘텐츠 부족으로 내국인뿐만 아니라 외국인 관광객들도 제주에 등을 돌리고 있다. The Korea Times
examples.english: Like her, more Koreans, as well as foreign tourists, are turning their backs on Jeju due to a lack of content to encourage tourists to revisit the island. 발음
